name: quick-feet

effect.diamond_pearl: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
effect.platinum: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

short_effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
flavor_text.platinum: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
